snippet: While other brands struggle with the social approach, Solestruck, Black Milk and Jeffrey Campbell have all, in some form or another, taken crowd sourcing and style to a new height, making them natural allies.
abstract: While other brands struggle with the social approach, Solestruck, Black Milk and Jeffrey Campbell have all, in some form or another, taken crowd sourcing and style to a new height, making them natural allies.

headline.main: Staying Connected, One Shoe at a Time
